roleset.name: have a certain quantity
roleset.note: NUMBER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'number' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'total'. (from number.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ergative
example.text: Items listed as being in short supply numbered only about a dozen, but they included one newcomer: milk and milk powder.
example.arg: Items listed as being in short supply

example.name: passive
example.text: It is a certainty that [Mr. Barre's days]-1 are numbered *trace*-1.

roleset.name: give numbers to

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: The numbering for A and B are both red.

example.name: all args
example.text: His numbering of these pages with Roman numerals is inconsistant with the rest of the document.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.
